optionalfeature.name: Updraft
entries: {@b Description:} Gain swiftness from a gust of wind that launches nearby foes.

optionalfeature.name: Impale
entries: {@b Description:} Spear your foes on a giant stone spike.

optionalfeature.name: Ring of Earth
entries: {@b Description:} Use the earth to launch yourself into the air and strike foes in a small radius. Deliver a larger ring of earthen spikes upon impact.

optionalfeature.name: Earthen Rush
entries: {@b Description:} Quickly dash along the ground, summoning spikes along the way and then delivering an area strike.

optionalfeature.name: Earthquake
entries: {@b Description:} Trigger a quake at your location, knocking down foes and dealing massive damage.

optionalfeature.name: Flamewall
entries: {@b Description:} Create a wall of flame at the target area that burns foes.

optionalfeature.name: Fire Shield
entries: {@b Properties:} Fire Aura, Inflicts Burn, Grants Might
{@b Description:} Envelop yourself in a fiery shield that burns foes and grants might each time you are struck (cooldown of 1 second per attacker).

optionalfeature.name: Transmute Fire
entries: {@b Properties:} Explosive, Fire Aura, Damage, Grants Boons
{@b Description:} Use the energy of the fire aura to cause an explosion, damaging enemies and benefiting allies.

optionalfeature.name: Freezing Gust
entries: {@b Description:} Chill your foe for a brief time.

optionalfeature.name: Comet
entries: {@b Description:} Drop a comet of ice on target foe, damaging and dazing foes in the area.

optionalfeature.name: Swirling Winds
entries: {@b Description:} Create a swirling wind that blocks projectiles.

optionalfeature.name: Gale
entries: {@b Description:} Knock down your foe with a charged wind blast.

optionalfeature.name: Magnetic Wave
entries: {@b Properties:} Damage, Cures Conditions, Reflects Projectiles
{@b Description:} Damage foes, cure three of your conditions, and reflect projectiles with a magnetic surge.

optionalfeature.name: Obsidian Flesh
entries: {@b Description:} Envelop yourself in stony armor, making yourself invulnerable.

optionalfeature.name: Churning Earth
entries: {@b Properties:} Leap, Inflicts Damage, Inflicts Bleeding
{@b Description:} Leap at your foe and unleash a seismic wave that inflicts damage and bleeding.

optionalfeature.name: Magma Orb
entries: {@b Description:} Shoot a blob of molten rock that explodes after a delay.

optionalfeature.name: Boil
entries: {@b Description:} Boil the water around your foe.

optionalfeature.name: Steam
entries: {@b Description:} Blind your foe with superheated water.

optionalfeature.name: Lava Chains
entries: {@b Description:} Cripple multiple foes with lava chains.

optionalfeature.name: Heat Wave
entries: {@b Properties:} Inflicts Burn, Grants Vigor, Fire
{@b Description:} Launch three waves of heat. Each burns foes and grants vigor to allies.

optionalfeature.name: Water Missile
entries: {@b Description:} Launch a slow-moving homing missile.

optionalfeature.name: Ice Globe
entries: {@b Description:} Shoot a slow-moving orb that detonates upon impact.

optionalfeature.name: Ice Wall
entries: {@b Description:} Create a wall of ice that shatters when touched by enemies or when it expires, dealing heavy damage and chilling foes.

optionalfeature.name: Undercurrent
entries: {@b Description:} Release a current of water to damage foes and regenerate allies.

optionalfeature.name: Tidal Wave
entries: {@b Description:} Charge forward with tidal force, damaging foes and healing allies.

optionalfeature.name: Forked Lightning
entries: {@b Description:} Fire three bolts of lightning in an arc in front of you.

optionalfeature.name: Electrocute
entries: {@b Description:} Charge the water around your foe with electricity. Enemies currently using an ability are dazed.

optionalfeature.name: Air Pocket
entries: {@b Description:} Release a slow-moving, detonable air pocket. When it explodes, you teleport to that location.

optionalfeature.name: Vacuum
entries: {@b Description:} Detonate your air pocket to teleport to its location.

optionalfeature.name: Air Bubble
entries: {@b Description:} Trap your foe in an air bubble and make them float to the surface.

optionalfeature.name: Lightning Cage
entries: {@b Description:} Create an electrical field that stuns foes crossing it.

optionalfeature.name: Rock Blade
entries: {@b Description:} Shoot three rocky blades at your foe.

optionalfeature.name: Rock Spray
entries: {@b Description:} Spray a cone of gravel to bleed foes.

optionalfeature.name: Magnetic Current
entries: {@b Properties:} Reflects Projectiles, Inflicts Cripple, Earth
{@b Description:} Launch a large magnetic force that reflects projectiles along its path, crippling foes that touch it.

optionalfeature.name: Rock Anchor
entries: {@b Description:} Anchor a rock to your foe, making them sink.

optionalfeature.name: Murky Water
entries: {@b Description:} Cloud the water to blind your target and nearby foes.

optionalfeature.name: Shield Smack
entries: {@b Description:} Smack your foe with the magnetic shield.

optionalfeature.name: Shield Smash

prerequisite.other: Conjure Earth Shield. Must follow Shield Smack.

entries: {@b Properties:} Chain, Magnetic Shield, Inflicts Daze
{@b Description:} Smash your foe with the magnetic shield, stunning your opponent.

optionalfeature.name: Crippling Shield

prerequisite.other: Conjure Earth Shield. Must follow Shield Smash.

entries: {@b Properties:} Chain, Inflicts Cripple, Magnetic Shield
{@b Description:} Throw your shield in a line, crippling struck foes. This attack deals bonus damage if you have barrier.

optionalfeature.name: Stone Sheath
entries: {@b Properties:} Block, Inflicts Bleeding, Magnetic Shield, Tectonic Shift
{@b Description:} Block the next attack and cause bleeding to foes around you. Gain Tectonic Shift if you successfully block an attack.

optionalfeature.name: Magnetic Surge
entries: {@b Properties:} Magnetic Shield, Launch, Inflicts Daze
{@b Description:} Unleash a magnetic force, surging at your opponent and dazing them while gaining magnetic aura.

optionalfeature.name: Magnetic Shield
entries: {@b Properties:} Pull, Grants Protection, Magnetic Shield, Tectonic Shift
{@b Description:} Pull nearby foes to you with a magnetic force, gaining protection and Tectonic Shift for each foe pulled.

optionalfeature.name: Fortify
entries: {@b Description:} Use magnetism to envelop yourself in a shield, becoming invulnerable.

optionalfeature.name: Lava Axe
entries: {@b Description:} Throw a lava axe at your foe. Using another Lava Axe ability grants Double Lava Axe.

optionalfeature.name: Double Lava Axe

prerequisite.other: Conjure Flame Axe. Must follow Lava Axe.

entries: {@b Description:} Throw two lava axes at your foe.

optionalfeature.name: Explosive Lava Axe
entries: {@b Description:} Throw an explosive lava axe at the target location.

optionalfeature.name: Burning Retreat
entries: {@b Description:} Quickly roll backward, leaving behind a line of fire that burns.

optionalfeature.name: Ring of Fire
entries: {@b Description:} Damage nearby foes with a ring of fire, burning foes that pass through it.

optionalfeature.name: Flame Leap
entries: {@b Description:} Leap at your foe with a flaming attack that causes burning.

optionalfeature.name: Water Arrow
entries: {@b Description:} Shoot an arrow of water that damages foes and heals allies around the area of impact. Gain a stack of Water Arrow each time you strike an enemy.

optionalfeature.name: Frost Volley
entries: {@b Description:} Rapidly fire at your foe, making them vulnerable with each hit. Damage is increased per stack of Water Arrow.

optionalfeature.name: Frost Fan
entries: {@b Description:} Damage foes with a spread of icy arrows that cause chill. Extra projectiles are launched for each stack of Water Arrow accumulated.

optionalfeature.name: Frost Storm
entries: {@b Properties:} Ice Field, Damage, Inflicts Chill, Water Arrow

{@b Description:} Call down an ice storm on the targeted area. The number of final ice shards are increased for each stack of Water Arrow. Damage is reduced per target each time foes are struck by this skill.

optionalfeature.name: Deep Freeze
entries: {@b Description:} Encase your target in a block of solid ice. Duration is increased per stack of Water Arrow.

prerequisite.other: Conjure Lightning Hammer. Must follow Lightning Swing.

optionalfeature.name: Thunderclap

prerequisite.other: Conjure Lightning Hammer. Must follow Static Swing.

entries: {@b Description:} Smash the ground and damage nearby foes.

optionalfeature.name: Lightning Leap
entries: {@b Description:} Leap at your foe and hit them with electrical damage.

optionalfeature.name: Wind Blast
entries: {@b Description:} Launch your foe with a banishing smash.

optionalfeature.name: Invoke Lightning
entries: {@b Description:} Randomly strike the surrounding area with lightning. Damage is reduced per target each time foes are struck by this skill.

optionalfeature.name: Static Field
entries: {@b Description:} Manifest an electrical field that stuns foes crossing it.

optionalfeature.name: Flame Wave
entries: {@b Description:} Shoot a fireball at your foe with each swing.

optionalfeature.name: Fiery Eruption
entries: {@b Description:} Ram your sword into the ground and make fire erupt near your foes.

optionalfeature.name: Fiery Whirl
entries: {@b Description:} Advance forward, slashing foes in your way.

optionalfeature.name: Fiery Rush
entries: {@b Description:} Charge at your foe, leaving a line of fire behind you.

optionalfeature.name: Firestorm
entries: {@b Description:} Call down a firestorm on the target area.

optionalfeature.name: Electrified Tornado
entries: {@b Description:} Electrify your tornado form and make it shoot lightning.

optionalfeature.name: Dust Tornado
entries: {@b Description:} Gather up dust into your tornado form, making it shoot out dust devils that blind foes.

optionalfeature.name: Debris Tornado
entries: {@b Description:} Gather up debris into your tornado form and send it flying.

optionalfeature.name: Elemental Requiem
entries: {@b Description:} Unleash the elements from your core, firing a random elemental in all directions. Elements have differing effects based on your current tornado type.

optionalfeature.name: Dust Charge
entries: {@b Description:} Move swiftly in a direction, knocking back enemies you collide with.

optionalfeature.name: Empowering Flame

prerequisite.other: Access to the Fire Attunement Trait Line.

entries: Gain power while in fire attunement.

optionalfeature.name: Burning Precision
entries: Burning you inflict has increased duration and your critical hits gain a chance to inflict burning.

optionalfeature.name: Conjurer
entries: Gain fire aura when an ally picks up a conjured weapon.

optionalfeature.name: Burning Fire
entries: Cast Lesser Cleansing Fire when you have a number of conditions on you.

optionalfeature.name: Sunspot

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Burning Precision|GW2} or {@optfeature Conjurer|GW2} or {@optfeature Burning Fire|GW2}

entries: Gain a fire aura, and damage nearby foes when you attune to fire. Also triggers on overload skills.

optionalfeature.name: Burning Rage
entries: Sunspot inflicts burning, and its radius is increased. Your condition damage is increased.

optionalfeature.name: Smothering Auras
entries: Fire auras have increased duration. Applying auras to allies removes conditions, and transmuting auras removes conditions from nearby allies.

optionalfeature.name: Power Overwhelming
entries: While at or above the might threshold, gain increased power. Power bonuses are doubled while attuned to fire.

optionalfeature.name: Pyromancer's Training

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Burning Rage|GW2} or {@optfeature Smothering Auras|GW2} or {@optfeature Power Overwhelming|GW2}

entries: Your fire weapon skills gain reduced recharge. Deal increased strike damage to burning foes.

optionalfeature.name: Persisting Flames
entries: Fire fields created by weapon skills last longer. Whenever your fire fields hit a foe or you inflict burning, gain increased strike damage for a duration.

optionalfeature.name: Pyromancer's Puissance
entries: Gain might for using any skill while attuned to fire. When leaving fire attunement or successfully completing a fire overload, unleash a Flame Expulsion.

optionalfeature.name: Inferno
entries: Burning you inflict scales off of your power instead of your condition damage.

optionalfeature.name: Zephyr's Speed

prerequisite.other: Access to the Air Attunement Trait Line.

entries: Your chance to critically strike is increased. While attuned to air, your movement speed is also increased.

optionalfeature.name: Zephyr's Boon
entries: Grant boons to allies you grant auras to.

optionalfeature.name: One with Air
entries: Gain superspeed when attuning to air.

optionalfeature.name: Ferocious Winds
entries: Gain ferocity based on your precision.

optionalfeature.name: Electric Discharge

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Zephyr's Boon|GW2} or {@optfeature One with Air|GW2} or {@optfeature Ferocious Winds|GW2}

entries: Strike your target with a bolt of lightning when attuning to air. Also triggers on overload skills.

optionalfeature.name: Inscription
entries: Gain boons upon casting a glyph based on your attunement.

optionalfeature.name: Raging Storm
entries: Critically striking a foe grants fury. Gain ferocity while under the effects of fury.

optionalfeature.name: Stormsoul
entries: Deal increased strike damage to disabled or defiant foes. Outgoing stun duration increased. Disables include stun, daze, knockback, pull, knockdown, sink, float, launch, taunt, and fear.

optionalfeature.name: Aeromancer's Training

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Inscription|GW2} or {@optfeature Raging Storm|GW2} or {@optfeature Stormsoul|GW2}

entries: Gain ferocity, and gain additional ferocity while attuned to air. Air weapon skills get a reduced recharge time.

optionalfeature.name: Bolt to the Heart
entries: Deal increased strike damage to enemies below the health threshold.

optionalfeature.name: Fresh Air
entries: Recharge air attunement on a critical hit. Gain a ferocity boon when attuning to air.

optionalfeature.name: Lightning Rod
entries: Cast Lightning Rod when you disable a foe. Disables include stun, daze, knockback, pull, knockdown, sink, float, launch, taunt, and fear.

optionalfeature.name: Stone Flesh

prerequisite.other: Access to the Earth Attunement Trait Line.

entries: Strike damage taken is reduced while attuned to earth.

optionalfeature.name: Earth's Embrace
entries: Gain resistance after using a healing skill.

optionalfeature.name: Serrated Stones
entries: Bleeding you inflict has increased duration. Deal increased damage to bleeding foes.

optionalfeature.name: Elemental Shielding
entries: Auras you grant to allies also grant protection.

optionalfeature.name: Earthen Blast

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Earth's Embrace|GW2} or {@optfeature Serrated Stones|GW2} or {@optfeature Elemental Shielding|GW2}

entries: Gain barrier and cripple nearby foes when attuning to earth. Also triggers on overload skills. Barrier will not be gained when attuning to the same element.

optionalfeature.name: Strength of Stone
entries: Gain condition damage based on your toughness. Inflict bleeding when you immobilize a foe. Bleeding can only occur on the same target once per interval.

optionalfeature.name: Rock Solid
entries: Grant stability to nearby allies when attuning to earth. Note: This effect will not trigger when attuning to the same element.

optionalfeature.name: Earthen Blessing
entries: Decrease the duration of movement-impairing conditions applied to you. Restore endurance when you receive one of these conditions.

optionalfeature.name: Geomancer's Training

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Strength of Stone|GW2} or {@optfeature Rock Solid|GW2} or {@optfeature Earthen Blessing|GW2}

entries: Strike damage from nearby foes is reduced. Earth weapon skills gain reduced recharge.

optionalfeature.name: Diamond Skin
entries: Remove conditions from yourself when you successfully combo a field with a leap finisher. Remove conditions from nearby allies when you successfully combo a field with a blast finisher.

optionalfeature.name: Written in Stone
entries: Signets continue to grant their passive bonuses while recharging. Gain an aura when you use a signet skill.

optionalfeature.name: Stone Heart
entries: You cannot be critically hit for a duration of time after entering or exiting earth attunement. Remaining effect duration is lost when exiting.

optionalfeature.name: Soothing Mist

prerequisite.other: Access to the Water Attunement Trait Line.

entries: You and nearby allies recover health while you are attuned to water.

optionalfeature.name: Soothing Ice
entries: Gain regeneration and frost aura when using a healing skill.

optionalfeature.name: Piercing Shards
entries: Vulnerability you inflict has increased duration. Deal increased strike damage to vulnerable foes. Damage bonus is doubled while attuned to water.

optionalfeature.name: Stop, Drop, and Roll
entries: Dodging removes burning and chilled from nearby allies.

optionalfeature.name: Healing Ripple

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Soothing Ice|GW2} or {@optfeature Piercing Shards|GW2} or {@optfeature Stop, Drop, and Roll|GW2}

entries: Heal nearby allies when attuning to water. This effect will not trigger when attuning to the same element, but will be triggered by overload skills.

optionalfeature.name: Cleansing Wave
entries: Remove conditions from nearby allies when attuning to water.

optionalfeature.name: Flow like Water
entries: Deal increased strike damage, which is further increased while your health is above the threshold. Blocking or evading an attack heals you.

optionalfeature.name: Aquamancer's Training

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Soothing Disruption|GW2} or {@optfeature Cleansing Wave|GW2} or {@optfeature Flow like Water|GW2}

entries: Increase healing to other allies. Water-weapon skills gain reduced recharge.

optionalfeature.name: Cleansing Water
entries: Cleanse conditions from allies you grant regeneration to.

optionalfeature.name: Powerful Aura
entries: Any aura you grant yourself is granted to nearby allies.

optionalfeature.name: Soothing Power
entries: Gain vitality. Soothing Mist is more effective.

optionalfeature.name: Arcane Prowess

prerequisite.other: Access to the Arcane Trait Line.

entries: Gain boons when you switch attunements.

optionalfeature.name: Arcane Precision
entries: Your critical strikes have a chance to inflict a condition based on your attunement.

optionalfeature.name: Renewing Stamina
entries: Gain vigor when you critically strike a foe.

optionalfeature.name: Elemental Attunement

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Arcane Precision|GW2} or {@optfeature Renewing Stamina|GW2} or {@optfeature Arcane Restoration|GW2}

entries: Grant a boon to nearby allies when changing attunements. Note: This effect will not trigger when attuning to the same element.

optionalfeature.name: Arcane Resurrection
entries: Cast Geyser when you begin reviving a downed ally. Geyser now partially revives downed allies. When you begin reviving an ally, you gain an aura based on your attunement.

optionalfeature.name: Elemental Lockdown
entries: When you disable a foe, gain a boon based upon your current attunement.

optionalfeature.name: Final Shielding
entries: Cast Lesser Arcane Shield when you use an elite skill.

optionalfeature.name: Elemental Enchantment

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Arcane Resurrection|GW2} or {@optfeature Elemental Lockdown|GW2} or {@optfeature Final Shielding|GW2}

entries: Gain concentration and your attunements gain reduced recharge.

optionalfeature.name: Evasive Arcana
entries: Cast a skill when you dodge based on your attunement.

optionalfeature.name: Arcane Lightning
entries: Arcane skills grant increased ferocity and have additional effects.

optionalfeature.name: Bountiful Power
entries: Deal increased strike damage for each boon on you.

optionalfeature.name: Rifle Burst
entries: {@b Description:} Deliver a quick burst of fire that pierces targets, followed by an explosive grenade.

optionalfeature.name: Rifle Burst Grenade
entries: {@b Description:} Fire an explosive grenade from your rifle.

optionalfeature.name: Blunderbuss
entries: {@b Description:} Fire several shards of shrapnel that inflict more damage the closer you are to foes. You and nearby allies gain might.

optionalfeature.name: Net Shot
entries: {@b Description:} Immobilize foes with a net shot.

optionalfeature.name: Overcharged Shot
entries: {@b Description:} Fire a blast so strong that it launches your foe as the recoil frees you from any movement-impairing conditions.

optionalfeature.name: Jump Shot
entries: {@b Description:} Blast the ground, damaging nearby foes and leaping to your target.

optionalfeature.name: Fragmentation Shot
entries: {@b Description:} Fire a shot that bleeds the impacted target and then shatters, dealing damage to nearby enemies.

optionalfeature.name: Poison Dart Volley
entries: {@b Description:} Fire a volley of darts that poison foes.

optionalfeature.name: Static Shot
entries: {@b Properties:} Bounces, Inflicts Blind, Inflicts Confusion
{@b Description:} Discharge a lightning shot that bounces between multiple foes, blinding and confusing them.

optionalfeature.name: Blowtorch
entries: {@b Description:} Unleash flames from your pistol to burn foes. Deals more damage the closer you are.

optionalfeature.name: Glue Shot
entries: {@b Description:} Coat the target area with a glue puddle that immobilizes foes on impact, then cripples foes that remain within.

optionalfeature.name: Magnetic Shield
entries: {@b Description:} Create a magnetic field that reflects projectiles and can be released to knock back foes.

optionalfeature.name: Magnetic Inversion

prerequisite.other: Requires Shield. Must follow Magnetic Shield activation.

entries: {@b Description:} Release the magnetic field to knock back nearby foes.

optionalfeature.name: Static Shield
entries: {@b Description:} Electrify your shield, preparing to throw it at foes. Stun nearby enemies that attack you while blocking.

optionalfeature.name: Throw Shield

prerequisite.other: Requires Shield. Must follow Static Shield activation.

entries: {@b Description:} Throw your charged shield. Dazes foes it hits on the way out and back.

optionalfeature.name: Homing Torpedo
entries: {@b Description:} Fire a shot that homes in on your foe and detonates an area around them.

optionalfeature.name: Scatter Mines
entries: {@b Description:} Fire out a spread of explosive mines at your enemy.

optionalfeature.name: Capture Line
entries: {@b Description:} Cast out a towline and drag your foe toward you.

optionalfeature.name: Timed Charge
entries: {@b Description:} Fire a timed charge at your target, damaging and burning nearby foes when it detonates.

optionalfeature.name: Net Wall
entries: {@b Description:} Launch a deployable net wall to immobilize foes caught within.

optionalfeature.name: Bomb
entries: {@b Description:} Set an explosive that damages nearby foes.

optionalfeature.name: Fire Bomb
entries: {@b Description:} Set an explosive that burns nearby foes.

optionalfeature.name: Galvanic Bomb
entries: {@b Description:} Set an explosive that electrocutes nearby foes, dazing them.

optionalfeature.name: Magnetic Bomb
entries: {@b Description:} Set a timed charge that pulls nearby foes.

optionalfeature.name: Big Ol' Bomb
entries: {@b Description:} Set a timed charge with a big blast that knocks down nearby foes. This skill blast finishes twice.

optionalfeature.name: Mortar Shot
entries: {@b Description:} Launch an explosive round from your mortar, damaging foes in the target area.

optionalfeature.name: Poison Gas Shell
entries: {@b Description:} Launch a mortar round that spreads poisonous gas in an area.

optionalfeature.name: Endothermic Shell
entries: {@b Description:} Launch a mortar round that chills foes in the target area.

optionalfeature.name: Flash Shell
entries: {@b Description:} Launch a phosphorous mortar round that burns brightly at impact point.

optionalfeature.name: Elixir Shell
entries: {@b Description:} Elixir. Launch a mortar round that heals allies in the target area.

optionalfeature.name: Tranquilizer Dart
entries: {@b Description:} Fire a dart that bleeds and weakens foes.

optionalfeature.name: Glob Shot
entries: {@b Properties:} Bouncing, Inflicts Cripple, Grants Swiftness, Immobilize
{@b Description:} Fire a bouncing glob that cripples foes and grants swiftness to you and your allies. The first enemy struck is immobilized.

optionalfeature.name: Fumigate
entries: {@b Properties:} Inflicts Poison, Inflicts Vulnerability, Cures Conditions
{@b Description:} Spray a cone of elixir fumes, inflicting poison and vulnerability to foes and curing conditions on allies with every strike.

optionalfeature.name: Acid Bomb
entries: {@b Description:} Elixir. Leap backward, spraying an acidic elixir on the ground that damages nearby foes.

optionalfeature.name: Super Elixir
entries: {@b Properties:} Elixir, Heal, Grants Continuous Healing
{@b Description:} Elixir. Shoot an elixir orb, healing allies when it bursts and creating an area of continual healing.

optionalfeature.name: Super Elixir (Flip-over)
entries: {@b Properties:} Elixir, Heal, Grants Continuous Healing
{@b Description:} Burst the orb, instantly healing your allies and creating an area of continual healing.

optionalfeature.name: Flame Jet
entries: {@b Description:} Spray fire in a cone pattern while moving, burning foes on the final attack. Deals 10% bonus damage to burning targets.

optionalfeature.name: Flame Blast
entries: {@b Description:} Fire a napalm ball that explodes on impact.

optionalfeature.name: Air Blast
entries: {@b Description:} Push back foes and projectiles with a hot-air blast, burning foes that are already on fire.

optionalfeature.name: Stoke the Flames
entries: {@b Description:} Overcharge your flamethrower with a fuel injection, releasing a burst of flames around you as you grant yourself boons.

optionalfeature.name: Napalm
entries: {@b Description:} Immobilize enemies in front of you with a cone of intense fire.

optionalfeature.name: Grenade
entries: {@b Description:} Throw several grenades that explode.

optionalfeature.name: Shrapnel Grenade
entries: {@b Description:} Throw grenades that explode in a hall of shrapnel, causing bleeding.

optionalfeature.name: Flash Grenade
entries: {@b Description:} Throw grenades that explode in blinding flashes.

optionalfeature.name: Freeze Grenade
entries: {@b Description:} Throw grenades that chill foes with frigid blasts.

optionalfeature.name: Poison Grenade
entries: {@b Description:} Throw several grenades that explode in poisonous blasts.

optionalfeature.name: Med Blaster
entries: {@b Description:} Restore health to allies with several pulses of healing energy. Heals more for each boon on the ally.

optionalfeature.name: Bandage Blast
entries: {@b Description:} Fire several bandages ahead of you to heal allies.

optionalfeature.name: Cleansing Field
entries: {@b Description:} Release purifying vapors to cleanse conditions from allies near you at each interval.

optionalfeature.name: Vital Burst
entries: {@b Description:} Unleash a cascade of concentrated healing vapors around you.

optionalfeature.name: Infusion Bomb
entries: {@b Description:} Throw a bomb that grants boons to nearby allies when it explodes.

optionalfeature.name: Smack
entries: {@b Description:} Smack your foe. Repair turrets.

optionalfeature.name: Whack

prerequisite.other: Requires Tool Kit. Must follow Smack.

entries: {@b Description:} Whack your foe. Repairs turrets.

optionalfeature.name: Thwack

prerequisite.other: Requires Tool Kit. Must follow Whack.

entries: {@b Description:} Thwack your foe. Repairs turrets.

optionalfeature.name: Box of Nails
entries: {@b Properties:} Inflicts Bleeding, Inflicts Cripple, Immobilize

{@b Description:} Scatter nails that bleed and cripple foes. The first pulse of this skill will immobilize foes who are movement impaired or disabled. Disables include stun, daze, knockdown, pull, knockback, sink, float, launch, taunt, and fear.

optionalfeature.name: Box of Piranhas
entries: {@b Properties:} Inflicts Bleeding, Inflicts Cripple, Immobilize, Underwater Skill

{@b Description:} Release piranhas that bleed and cripple foes. The first pulse of this skill will immobilize foes who are movement impaired or disabled. Disables include stun, daze, knockdown, pull, knockback, sink, float, launch, taunt, and fear.

optionalfeature.name: Pry Bar
entries: {@b Description:} Confuse your foe by smacking them with a pry bar.

optionalfeature.name: Magnet
entries: {@b Description:} Pull your target to you.

optionalfeature.name: Arcane Brilliance
entries: {@b Properties:} Arcane, Heal, Combo Finisher, Critical Damage

{@b Description:} Arcane. Blast the area, hitting foes with critical damage and healing yourself. Healing effectiveness is increased per target hit. If this skill finishes a combo, you heal an additional amount.

optionalfeature.name: Ether Renewal
entries: {@b Description:} Cantrip. Cure a condition and heal yourself with every pulse.

optionalfeature.name: Glyph of Elemental Harmony
entries: {@b Properties:} Glyph, Heal, Grants Boon (Attunement Dependent)
{@b Description:} Glyph. Heal yourself and gain a boon based on your attunement.

optionalfeature.name: Signet of Restoration
entries: {@b Description:} {@b Signet Passive:} Grants health every time you cast a spell.

optionalfeature.name: A.E.D.
entries: {@b Description:} Activate your A.E.D., enabling the system to heal you after a brief period of time. If you take lethal damage while A.E.D. is active, it ends and heals you for a large amount and removes conditions.

optionalfeature.name: Static Shock
entries: {@b Description:} Use your A.E.D. to stun an enemy.

optionalfeature.name: Elixir H
entries: {@b Properties:} Elixir, Heal, Grants Protection, Regeneration, Swiftness
{@b Description:} Drink Elixir H to heal yourself and gain protection, regeneration, and swiftness.

optionalfeature.name: Toss Elixir H

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Elixir H

entries: {@b Properties:} Elixir, Grants Protection, Regeneration, Vigor
{@b Description:} Toss Elixir H to grant protection, regeneration, and vigor to allies.

optionalfeature.name: Healing Turret
entries: {@b Description:} Deploy a turret that heals you briefly, then regenerates you and your allies. This turret overcharges when it is first placed.

prerequisite.other: Flip Over Skill for Healing Turret

optionalfeature.name: Regenerating Mist
entries: {@b Description:} Release a mist of healing liquid to regenerate nearby allies.

optionalfeature.name: Med Kit
entries: {@b Description:} Equip a kit that replaces your weapon with healing skills. You gain access to the {@optfeature Med Blaster|GW2}, {@optfeature Bandage Blast|GW2}, {@optfeature Cleansing Field|GW2}, {@optfeature Vital Burst|GW2}, and {@optfeature Infusion Bomb|GW2} weaponskills.

optionalfeature.name: Bandage Self

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Med Kit

entries: {@b Description:} Bandage your wounds and heal yourself.

optionalfeature.name: Arcane Blast
entries: {@b Description:} Arcane. Blast your foe with energy for critical damage.

optionalfeature.name: Arcane Echo
entries: {@b Description:} Arcane. The next weapon skill you use has significantly reduced recharge, and this skill's recharge is increased by the original recharge of the affected skill.

optionalfeature.name: Arcane Shield
entries: {@b Properties:} Arcane, Block, Explosive, Critical Damage
{@b Description:} Arcane. Block attacks with an energy shield. If it blocks three attacks, it explodes for critical damage.

optionalfeature.name: Arcane Wave
entries: {@b Description:} Arcane. Blast foes in the target area with an energy wave for critical damage.

optionalfeature.name: Armor of Earth
entries: {@b Properties:} Cantrip, Grants Protection, Grants Stability, Grants Barrier
{@b Description:} Cantrip. Protect yourself with earth armor and gain protection and stability, then gain barrier for each unique boon you have.

optionalfeature.name: Cleansing Fire
entries: {@b Properties:} Cantrip, Cures Conditions, Inflicts Burn, Grants Might
{@b Description:} Cantrip. Cure conditions and burn foes. Gain might for each condition removed.

optionalfeature.name: Lightning Flash
entries: {@b Description:} Cantrip. Teleport to target area.

optionalfeature.name: Mist Form
entries: {@b Description:} Cantrip. Morph into an invulnerable, vaporous mist for a brief time.

optionalfeature.name: Conjure Earth Shield
entries: {@b Properties:} Conjure, Magnetic Shield, Grants Toughness, Grants Vitality
{@b Description:} Conjure. Manifest a magnetic shield in your hands and at the target location. Wielders of the weapon gain increased toughness and vitality.

optionalfeature.name: Conjure Flame Axe
entries: {@b Properties:} Conjure, Lava Axe, Grants Power, Grants Condition Damage
{@b Description:} Conjure. Manifest a lava axe in your hands and at the target location. Wielders of the weapon gain increased power and condition damage.

optionalfeature.name: Conjure Frost Bow
entries: {@b Properties:} Conjure, Frost Bow, Grants Condition Duration, Grants Healing Power
{@b Description:} Conjure. Manifest a frost bow in your hands and at the target location. Wielders of this weapon gain increased condition duration and healing power.

optionalfeature.name: Conjure Lightning Hammer
entries: {@b Properties:} Conjure, Lightning Hammer, Grants Precision, Grants Ferocity
{@b Description:} Conjure. Manifest a lightning hammer in your hands and at the target location. Wielders of this weapon gain increased precision and ferocity.

optionalfeature.name: Glyph of Elemental Power
entries: {@b Description:} Glyph. Unleash elemental energy around yourself. Its effect will differ based on your attunement.

optionalfeature.name: Glyph of Lesser Elementals
entries: {@b Description:} Glyph. Summon a lesser elemental based on your attunement.

optionalfeature.name: Signet of Air
entries: {@b Properties:} Signet, Movement Speed, Inflicts Blind
{@b Description:} {@b Signet Passive:} Grants a 25% increase in movement speed.
{@b Effect:} {@b Signet Active:} Blind your target and nearby foes.

optionalfeature.name: Signet of Earth
entries: {@b Properties:} Signet, Toughness, Immobilize, Inflicts Bleeding
{@b Effect:} {@b Signet Active:} Immobilize and bleed your foe.

optionalfeature.name: Signet of Fire
entries: {@b Properties:} Signet, Critical Chance, Inflicts Burn
{@b Description:} {@b Signet Passive:} Improves critical chance.
{@b Effect:} {@b Signet Active:} Burn your target and nearby foes.

optionalfeature.name: Signet of Water
entries: {@b Properties:} Signet, Reduces Condition Duration, Damage, Inflicts Chill, Heal, Revive
{@b Description:} {@b Signet Passive:} Reduces incoming condition duration.
{@b Effect:} {@b Signet Active:} Damage and chill foes while healing and reviving allies in an area.

optionalfeature.name: Glyph of Storms
entries: {@b Description:} Glyph. Create a storm based on your attunement.

optionalfeature.name: Glyph of Renewal
entries: {@b Description:} Glyph. Revive allies with different attunement effects.

optionalfeature.name: Bomb Kit
entries: {@b Description:} Equip a kit that replaces your weapon with bomb skills. You gain access to the {@optfeature Bomb|GW2}, {@optfeature Fire Bomb|GW2}, {@optfeature Galvanic Bomb|GW2}, {@optfeature Magnetic Bomb|GW2}, and {@optfeature Big Ol' Bomb|GW2} weapon skills.

optionalfeature.name: Smoke Bomb

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Bomb Kit

entries: {@b Description:} Set a timed charge that creates a cloud of smoke, blinding nearby foes.

optionalfeature.name: Grenade Kit
entries: {@b Description:} Equip a kit that replaces your weapon with grenade skills. You gain access to the {@optfeature Grenade|GW2}, {@optfeature Shrapnel Grenade|GW2}, {@optfeature Flash Grenade|GW2}, {@optfeature Freeze Grenade|GW2}, and {@optfeature Poison Grenade|GW2} weapon skills.

optionalfeature.name: Grenade Barrage

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Grenade Kit

entries: {@b Description:} Throw several grenades at once.

optionalfeature.name: Elixir Gun
entries: {@b Description:} Arm yourself with an elixir gun that replaces your weapon skills. You gain access to the {@optfeature Tranquilizer Dart|GW2}, {@optfeature Glob Shot|GW2}, {@optfeature Fumigate|GW2}, {@optfeature Acid Bomb|GW2}, and {@optfeature Super Elixir|GW2} weapon skills.

optionalfeature.name: Healing Mist

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Elixir Gun

entries: {@b Description:} Vent a healing mist, granting regeneration to yourself and allies.

optionalfeature.name: Flamethrower
entries: {@b Description:} Arm yourself with a flamethrower that replaces your weapon skills. You gain access to the {@optfeature Flame Jet|GW2}, {@optfeature Flame Blast|GW2}, {@optfeature Air Blast|GW2}, {@optfeature Stoke the Flames|GW2}, and {@optfeature Napalm|GW2} weapon skills.

optionalfeature.name: Smoke Vent
entries: {@b Description:} Vent smoke from your flamethrower, blinding nearby foes.

optionalfeature.name: Tool Kit
entries: {@b Description:} Equip a kit that gives you a variety of tools. You gain access to the {@optfeature Smack|GW2}, {@optfeature Box of Nails|GW2}, {@optfeature Pry Bar|GW2}, {@optfeature Gear Shield|GW2}, and {@optfeature Magnet|GW2} weapon skills.

optionalfeature.name: Throw Wrench

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Tool Kit

entries: {@b Description:} Throw a wrench that returns to you, striking foes each way.

optionalfeature.name: Elixir B
entries: {@b Properties:} Elixir, Grants Fury, Might, Resolution, Swiftness
{@b Description:} Drink Elixir B to gain fury, might, resolution, and swiftness, then extend the duration of boons on yourself.

optionalfeature.name: Toss Elixir B

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Elixir B

entries: {@b Properties:} Elixir, Grants Stability, Fury, Might, Resolution, Retaliation
{@b Description:} Toss Elixir B to grant stability and one of the following boons to allies: fury, might, retaliation, or swiftness.

optionalfeature.name: Elixir C
entries: {@b Description:} Drink Elixir C, converting all conditions into boons, then heal yourself per boon on you.

optionalfeature.name: Toss Elixir C

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Elixir C

entries: {@b Properties:} Elixir, Converts Conditions, Grants Boons
{@b Description:} Toss Elixir C, converting conditions into boons for allies.

optionalfeature.name: Elixir R
entries: {@b Properties:} Elixir, Endurance Refill, Removes Immobilize
{@b Description:} Drink Elixir R to refill your endurance and remove immobilizing effects.

optionalfeature.name: Toss Elixir R

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Elixir R

entries: {@b Description:} Toss Elixir R to revive allies at a location.

optionalfeature.name: Elixir S
entries: {@b Description:} Drink Elixir S to shrink yourself, recover from stun, and evade attacks.

optionalfeature.name: Toss Elixir S

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Elixir S

entries: {@b Description:} Toss Elixir S, granting stealth to allies in the target area.

optionalfeature.name: Elixir U
entries: {@b Properties:} Elixir, Grants Quickness, Stability, Vigor
{@b Description:} Drink Elixir U, gaining quickness, stability, and vigor.

optionalfeature.name: Toss Elixir U

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Elixir U

entries: {@b Properties:} Elixir, Breaks Stun, Grants Superspeed
{@b Description:} Toss Elixir U, breaking stuns on allies and granting them superspeed.

optionalfeature.name: Personal Battering Ram
entries: {@b Description:} Launch a target foe with a concealed ram head.

optionalfeature.name: Launch Personal Battering Ram

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Personal Battering Ram

entries: {@b Description:} Shoot a ram's head in front of you, impairing any struck foes.

optionalfeature.name: Rocket Boots
entries: {@b Description:} Fly forward, removing movement-impairing conditions and damaging foes with your rocket exhaust. Movement-impairing conditions include cripple, chill, and immobilize.

optionalfeature.name: Rocket Kick

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Rocket Boots

entries: {@b Description:} Use your rocket boots to do an explosive kick that burns foes.

optionalfeature.name: Slick Shoes
entries: {@b Description:} Spray oil behind you, knocking down foes. If underwater, foes entering the field are blinded and slowed.

optionalfeature.name: Slick Shoes
entries: {@b Properties:} Gadget, Knockdown, Inflicts Blind, Inflicts Slow
{@b Description:} Spray oil behind you, knocking down foes. If underwater, foes entering the field are blinded and slowed.

optionalfeature.name: Superspeed

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Slick Shoes

entries: {@b Description:} Activate your slick shoes, enabling you to move at superior speeds.

optionalfeature.name: Throw Mine
entries: {@b Description:} Throw out a remote-controlled land mine that damages, knocks back foes, and removes a boon from nearby foes.

optionalfeature.name: Detonate

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Throw Mine

entries: {@b Description:} Detonate your mine to damage foes and remove a boon from them.

optionalfeature.name: Mine Field
entries: {@b Description:} Plant five mines around yourself.

optionalfeature.name: Detonate Mine Field

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Mine Field

entries: {@b Description:} Detonate your mine field, damaging nearby foes.

optionalfeature.name: Utility Goggles
entries: {@b Properties:} Gadget, Break Stun, Grants Resistance, Removes Conditions, Inflicts Damage
{@b Description:} Gadget. Break out of stun, gaining resistance, clearing blindness, and removing damaging conditions.

optionalfeature.name: Flashbang

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Utility Goggles

entries: {@b Properties:} Daze, Inflicts Blind, Reveals Stealth
{@b Description:} Throw an explosive at the target area, dazing and blinding enemies on impact. Remove stealth and reveal enemies in a larger area around the impact.

optionalfeature.name: Flame Turret
entries: {@b Description:} Deploy a turret that burns foes. This turret overcharges when it is first placed.

optionalfeature.name: Throw Napalm

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Flame Turret

entries: {@b Description:} Throw a ball of napalm that explodes on impact, burning foes around target location.

optionalfeature.name: Net Turret
entries: {@b Description:} Build a net turret that immobilizes nearby foes. This turret overcharges when it is first placed.

optionalfeature.name: Net Attack

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Net Turret

entries: {@b Description:} Fire a net from your belt to immobilize your foe.

optionalfeature.name: Rifle Turret
entries: {@b Description:} Build a rifle turret that shoots at foes. This turret overcharges when it is first placed.

optionalfeature.name: Surprise Shot

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Rifle Turret

entries: {@b Description:} Fire a bullet out of your belt.

optionalfeature.name: Rocket Turret
entries: {@b Description:} Build a turret that fires rockets. This turret overcharges when it is first placed.

optionalfeature.name: Rocket

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Rocket Turret

entries: {@b Description:} Fire a rocket out of your belt that explodes on impact.

optionalfeature.name: Thumper Turret
entries: {@b Description:} Build a high-health thumper turret that damages nearby foes. This turret overcharges when it is first placed.

optionalfeature.name: Rumble

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Thumper Turret

entries: {@b Description:} Release a shock wave of inertial force to damage nearby foes.

optionalfeature.name: Tornado
entries: {@b Properties:} Cantrip, Grants Stability, Transform, Damage, Launch
{@b Description:} Cantrip. Gain stability and shape-shift into a tornado that damages and launches foes.

optionalfeature.name: Whirlpool
entries: {@b Properties:} Cantrip, Transform, Pull, Underwater Skill
{@b Description:} Cantrip. Shape-shift into a swirling maelstrom that pulls foes into its destructive vortex.

optionalfeature.name: Conjure Fiery Greatsword
entries: {@b Properties:} Conjure, Fire, Damage, Inflicts Burn, Grants Power, Grants Condition Damage

{@b Description:} Conjure. Manifest a fiery greatsword in your hands and at the target location. When it lands, it damages and burns foes. Wielders of this weapon gain increased power and condition damage and cast Lesser Fiery Eruption at regular intervals on random enemies.

optionalfeature.name: Glyph of Elementals
entries: {@b Description:} Glyph. Summon an elemental based on your attunement.

optionalfeature.name: Elite Mortar Kit
entries: {@b Description:} Equip the mortar kit. You gain access to the {@optfeature Mortar Shot|GW2}, {@optfeature Poison Gas Shell|GW2}, {@optfeature Endothermic Shell|GW2}, {@optfeature Flash Shell|GW2}, and {@optfeature Elixir Shell|GW2} weapon skills.

optionalfeature.name: Orbital Strike

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Elite Mortar Kit

entries: {@b Description:} Call down energy from the sky to blast an area.

optionalfeature.name: Elixir X
entries: {@b Description:} Drink Elixir X to become a rampaging brute, whirling tornado, or powerful lich. Underwater, become either a withering plague or a whirlpool.

optionalfeature.name: Toss Elixir X

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Elixir X

entries: {@b Description:} Toss your Elixir X, transforming enemies at the location into moas.

optionalfeature.name: Supply Crate
entries: {@b Description:} Request a supply drop of turrets. Turrets overcharge when they are first dropped.

optionalfeature.name: Detonate Supply Crate Turrets
entries: {@b Description:} Detonate your supply crate turrets.

optionalfeature.name: Med Pack Drop

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Supply Crate

entries: {@b Description:} Call down a supply drop of med packs into a target area.

optionalfeature.name: Explosive Entrance
entries: Your first attack when entering combat explodes, dealing damage to nearby foes. This ability refreshes after a dodge roll.

optionalfeature.name: Grenadier
entries: Increase the blast radius of grenades. Using a healing skill casts Lesser Grenade Barrage.

optionalfeature.name: Short Fuse
entries: Gain fury when you hit a foe with an Explosion.

optionalfeature.name: Glass Cannon
entries: Strike damage dealt increases when above health threshold.

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Grenadier|GW2} or {@optfeature Short Fuse|GW2} or {@optfeature Glass Cannon|GW2}

optionalfeature.name: Aim-Assisted Rocket
entries: Missile hits launch a rocket at your target. After enough rockets have been fired, an orbital strike is called instead. This trait has an internal cooldown.

optionalfeature.name: Explosive Temper
entries: Explosions grant stacking ferocity when they hit.

optionalfeature.name: Blast Shield
entries: Explosive Entrance grants barrier. Gain vitality based on a percentage of your power.

optionalfeature.name: Shaped Charge

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Aim-Assisted Rocket|GW2} or {@optfeature Explosive Temper|GW2} or {@optfeature Blast Shield|GW2}

entries: Deal increased strike damage for each stack of vulnerability on your target.

optionalfeature.name: Grand Entrance
entries: Explosive Entrance grants you resistance and increased critical-strike chance for a brief duration.

optionalfeature.name: Shrapnel
entries: Explosions have a chance to cripple and cause bleeding on hit.

optionalfeature.name: Big Boomer
entries: Deal increased strike damage to foes with a lower health percentage than you. Hitting with an Explosion heals you over a few seconds.

optionalfeature.name: Sharpshooter
entries: Critical hits have a chance to cause bleeding.

optionalfeature.name: Chemical Rounds
entries: Gain condition damage. Your pistol skills gain increased condition duration.

optionalfeature.name: Sanguine Array
entries: Gain might when you inflict bleeding on a foe.

optionalfeature.name: High Caliber
entries: You have an increased critical hit chance against foes within the range threshold.

optionalfeature.name: Hematic Focus

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Chemical Rounds|GW2} or {@optfeature Sanguine Array|GW2} or {@optfeature High Caliber|GW2}

entries: Gain fury when you inflict bleeding on an enemy. Fury gives an increased critical-strike chance.

optionalfeature.name: Juggernaut
entries: Gain might while wielding a flamethrower. Might applied to you gains increased duration. Napalm grants you stability and a fire aura.

optionalfeature.name: Thermal Vision
entries: Gain expertise. Increase your outgoing condition damage when you inflict burning.

optionalfeature.name: No Scope
entries: Critical hits on foes within the range threshold have a chance to grant fury. Fury grants you ferocity.

optionalfeature.name: Serrated Steel

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Juggernaut|GW2} or {@optfeature Thermal Vision|GW2} or {@optfeature No Scope|GW2}

entries: Bleeding you inflict gains increased duration.

optionalfeature.name: Equal and Opposite Reaction
entries: Gain quickness and stability when you disable an enemy.

optionalfeature.name: Modified Ammunition
entries: Deal increased strike damage for each condition on a foe.

optionalfeature.name: Incendiary Powder
entries: Burning you inflict lasts longer, and your critical hits inflict burning.

optionalfeature.name: Cleansing Synergy
entries: Using a heal skill triggers a cleansing pulse around you.

optionalfeature.name: Over Shield
entries: Shield skills grant protection to nearby allies. Protection on you gains increased damage reduction.

optionalfeature.name: Automated Medical Response
entries: Grant regeneration to nearby allies when you use a healing skill's associated tool belt skill.

optionalfeature.name: Autodefense Bomb Dispenser
entries: Drop a smoke bomb when you are disabled. Disables include stun, daze, knockdown, pull, knockback, sink, float, launch, taunt, and fear.

optionalfeature.name: Reconstruction Enclosure

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Over Shield|GW2} or {@optfeature Automated Medical Response|GW2} or {@optfeature Autodefense Bomb Dispenser|GW2}

entries: Grant protection to nearby allies when you use a heal skill.

optionalfeature.name: Experimental Turrets
entries: Turrets create a reflective barrier when built and grant boons to allies around them on a regular interval.

optionalfeature.name: Soothing Detonation
entries: Heal nearby allies when using a tool belt skill.

optionalfeature.name: Energy Amplifier

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Experimental Turrets|GW2} or {@optfeature Soothing Detonation|GW2} or {@optfeature Mecha Legs|GW2}

entries: Your power and healing power are increased while you have regeneration.

optionalfeature.name: Anticorrosion Plating
entries: When you grant protection to an ally, cleanse conditions from them.

optionalfeature.name: Bunker Down
entries: Create a proximity mine at your target's location and a med kit at your location when you disable an enemy.

optionalfeature.name: Medical Dispersion Field
entries: While in combat, a percentage of healing you apply to yourself is stored by your Medical Dispersion Field. Each interval, stored healing is spent to heal nearby allies.

optionalfeature.name: Hidden Flask
entries: Drink a Lesser Elixir B when struck while below the health threshold.

optionalfeature.name: Invigorating Speed
entries: When you gain swiftness or superspeed, you also gain vigor.

optionalfeature.name: Protection Injection
entries: Gain protection when you are disabled. Disables include stun, daze, knockdown, pull, knockback, sink, float, launch, taunt, and fear.

optionalfeature.name: Health Insurance
entries: Increase your incoming healing effectiveness. Gain increased healing to others while using a med kit.

optionalfeature.name: Transmute

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Invigorating Speed|GW2} or {@optfeature Protection Injection|GW2} or {@optfeature Health Insurance|GW2}

entries: Drink a Lesser Elixir C when you use a healing skill.

optionalfeature.name: Comeback Cure
entries: Grant regeneration when you remove a condition from an ally.

optionalfeature.name: Boiling Point
entries: Gain fury when you gain might at or above the threshold.

optionalfeature.name: Backpack Regenerator
entries: Recover health every second when using an Engineering Kit.

optionalfeature.name: Compounding Chemicals

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Comeback Cure|GW2} or {@optfeature Boiling Point|GW2} or {@optfeature Backpack Regenerator|GW2}

entries: Heal yourself when you grant yourself a boon. Remove a condition from yourself when you use an elixir skill. Gain increased concentration.

optionalfeature.name: HGH
entries: Elixirs gain increased durations, and grant might.

optionalfeature.name: Purity of Purpose
entries: When you would cleanse a condition from an ally, convert it into a boon instead. This can affect multiple targets simultaneously.

optionalfeature.name: Chain Reactivity
entries: Gain barrier when you successfully finish a combo field with a leap or a blast. Every third successful finish grants a larger barrier and might.

optionalfeature.name: Optimized Activation
entries: Using tool belt skills grants vigor.

optionalfeature.name: Static Discharge
entries: Discharge a bolt of lightning whenever you use a tool belt skill.

optionalfeature.name: Reactive Lenses
entries: Activate Lesser Utility Goggles when using a healing skill.

optionalfeature.name: Power Wrench
entries: Reduce the recharge of your elite skill when you dodge.

optionalfeature.name: Mechanized Deployment

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Static Discharge|GW2} or {@optfeature Reactive Lenses|GW2} or {@optfeature Power Wrench|GW2}

entries: Your tool belt skills gain reduced recharge. Tool belt skills remove conditions. Engage Photon Forge cannot activate this trait.

optionalfeature.name: Streamlined Kits
entries: Equipping an Engineering Kit creates an attack or spell and grants you swiftness.

optionalfeature.name: Lock On
entries: Striking a stealthed foe triggers Invisible Analysis. Disabling a foe triggers Controlled Analysis. Disables include stun, daze, knockdown, pull, knockback, sink, float, launch, taunt, and fear.

optionalfeature.name: Takedown Round
entries: Deal increased strike damage while your endurance is not full.

optionalfeature.name: Excessive Energy

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Streamlined Kits|GW2} or {@optfeature Lock On|GW2} or {@optfeature Takedown Round|GW2}

entries: Strike damage dealt is increased while you have vigor.

optionalfeature.name: Kinetic Battery
entries: Gain Kinetic Charges when you use a tool belt skill. At maximum, charges gain a burst of speed.

sizeEntry.name: Size:
entries: Small (Asura are typically short and slender, standing around 3 to 4 feet tall and weighing between 40 to 60 pounds)

items.name: Age:
entries: Asura progeny mature quickly, being able to comprehend complex concepts by the age of 5. They reach physical maturity by 16 and can live up to a century.

entries.name: Traditional Asura Traits
entries: For most Asura, their subterranean heritage defines and shapes their innate capabilities.

entries.name: Trait Selection
entries: Selecting the traditional traits noted for your heritage is quick and easy, and creates a character who feels like a solid archetype within your chosen heritage. But you can swap any of those suggested traditional heritage traits for {@filter any of the traits provided|optionalfeatures|source=grimhollowpg24|feature type=ht}, building your character around any eight traits. This can include taking the traditional traits presented for any other heritage, taking one of your traditional traits again to gain its secondary effect, or taking any of the many traits that aren't part of any heritage's default presentation.

sizeEntry.name: Size:
entries: Medium (Charr are typically large and muscular, standing around 6 to 7 feet tall and weighing between 200 to 300 pounds)

items.name: Age:
entries: Charr cubs mature quickly, learning to hunt and fight at a young age. They reach physical maturity by 16 and can live up to a century.

entries.name: Traditional Charr Traits
entries: For most Charr, their military heritage defines and shapes their innate capabilities.

entries.name: Trait Selection
entries: Selecting the traditional traits noted for your heritage is quick and easy, and creates a character who feels like a solid archetype within your chosen heritage. But you can swap any of those suggested traditional heritage traits for {@filter any of the traits provided|optionalfeatures|source=grimhollowpg24|feature type=ht}, building your character around any eight traits. This can include taking the traditional traits presented for any other heritage, taking one of your traditional traits again to gain its secondary effect, or taking any of the many traits that aren't part of any heritage's default presentation.

sizeEntry.name: Size:
entries: Small or Medium (Humans vary widely in size, typically ranging from 5 to 6 feet tall and weighing between 120 to 220 pounds)

items.name: Age:
entries: Human children mature quickly, learning to socialize and develop skills early. They reach physical maturity by 16 and can live up to a century.

entries.name: Traditional Human Traits
entries: For most Humans, their diverse heritage defines and shapes their innate capabilities.

entries.name: Trait Selection
entries: Selecting the traditional traits noted for your heritage is quick and easy, and creates a character who feels like a solid archetype within your chosen heritage. But you can swap any of those suggested traditional heritage traits for {@filter any of the traits provided|optionalfeatures|source=grimhollowpg24|feature type=ht}, building your character around any eight traits. This can include taking the traditional traits presented for any other heritage, taking one of your traditional traits again to gain its secondary effect, or taking any of the many traits that aren't part of any heritage's default presentation.

sizeEntry.name: Size:
entries: Medium (Norn are typically larger than Humans, often standing between 6 to 7 feet tall and weighing between 200 to 300 pounds)

items.name: Age:
entries: Norn children mature quickly, learning to hunt and survive in the harsh wilderness. They reach physical maturity by 16 and can live up to 150 years.

entries.name: Traditional Norn Traits
entries: For most Norn, their upbringing in the harsh wilderness shapes their innate capabilities.

entries.name: Trait Selection
entries: Selecting the traditional traits noted for your heritage is quick and easy, and creates a character who feels like a solid archetype within your chosen heritage. But you can swap any of those suggested traditional heritage traits for {@filter any of the traits provided|optionalfeatures|source=grimhollowpg24|feature type=ht}, building your character around any eight traits. This can include taking the traditional traits presented for any other heritage, taking one of your traditional traits again to gain its secondary effect, or taking any of the many traits that aren't part of any heritage's default presentation.

sizeEntry.name: Size:
entries: Medium (Sylvari are typically similar in size to Humans, often standing between 5 to 6 feet tall and weighing between 100 to 200 pounds)

items.name: Age:
entries: Sylvari are born from the Pale Tree, learning to understand the world around them. They are physically mature just after emergence and it is unknown how long they can live.

entries.name: Traditional Sylvari Traits
entries: For most Sylvari, their upbringing in the Pale Tree shapes their innate capabilities.

entries.name: Trait Selection
entries: Selecting the traditional traits noted for your heritage is quick and easy, and creates a character who feels like a solid archetype within your chosen heritage. But you can swap any of those suggested traditional heritage traits for {@filter any of the traits provided|optionalfeatures|source=grimhollowpg24|feature type=ht}, building your character around any eight traits. This can include taking the traditional traits presented for any other heritage, taking one of your traditional traits again to gain its secondary effect, or taking any of the many traits that aren't part of any heritage's default presentation.
