variantrule.name: Aegis
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Boon|GW2}, the next attack roll made against you automatically misses. The {@variantrule Boon|GW2} then ends.
This {@variantrule Boon|GW2} corrupts into 1 stack of {@variantrule Burning|GW2} for 1 round, dealing damage equal to twice the PB of the creature who corrupted the Boon.

variantrule.name: Alacrity
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Boon|GW2}, you have advantage on initiative rolls and your initiative count is increased by your PB at the start of the round.
This {@variantrule Boon|GW2} corrupts into 1 round of {@variantrule Chilled|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Aura
entries: Auras are {@variantrule Effect|GW2|effects} that sourround a single creature and trigger when that creature is damaged.
If an aura of the same type is applied to a creature that already has one, the new aura replaces the old one if it has a higher intensity or longer duration; otherwise, the new aura has no effect.

variantrule.name: Barrier
entries: While you have a {@variantrule Barrier|GW2}, and you take damage, the barrier absorbs as much of that damage as it can. Any damage that exceeds the barriers remaining hit points is taken by you as normal.
Barrier lasts until it is depleted, you roll initiative or exit combat, or 10 minutes have passed.
You can have a maximum Barrier equal to 50% of your maximum hit points at any time.
When you gain Barrier, it stacks with any existing Barrier you have, up to your maximum.

variantrule.name: Bleeding
entries: A bleeding creature takes slashing damage at the start of each of its turns.
The amount of slashing damage is determined by the effect that applied it.
This {@variantrule Condition|GW2} get converted into 2 rounds of {@variantrule Vigor|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Blindness
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Condition|GW2}, the next attack roll you make automatically misses. The {@variantrule Condition|GW2} then ends.
A creature with a {@variantrule Defiance Bar|GW2} takes 20 defiance bar damage at the start of its turn instead of being affected.
This {@variantrule Condition|GW2} get converted into 1 round of {@variantrule Fury|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Boon
entries: Boons are beneficial {@variantrule Effect|GW2|effects} with a set duration applied by various features.
They are the opposite of {@variantrule Condition|GW2|Conditions}
Each Boon has an associated {@variantrule Condition|GW2}, which it can be corrupted into or converted from.
If a creature already under the effect of a Boon receives the same Boon again, one of two outcomes occurs, depending on the Boons properties:
{@bold Stacks Duration:} The Boons duration is extended by the duration of the new instance.

{@bold Stacks Intensity:} The Boons effects are applied again. Each instance functions independently, with its own duration. If one instance of the Boon becomes corrupted, all active instances become corrupted. Any {@variantrule condition|GW2} imposed by the corruption is applied only once.

variantrule.name: Burning
entries: A burning creature takes fire damage at the start of each of its turns.
The amount of fire damage is determined by the effect that applied it.
This {@variantrule Condition|GW2} get converted into 1 round of {@variantrule Aegis|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Chain
entries: When you use a skill with this {@variantrule Property|GW2}, you gain access to the next skill in the chain if you deal damage with it.

variantrule.name: Chaos Aura
entries: When you take damage, one of the following random effects occurs:

entries.caption: Chaos Aura Effects
rows: You gain 1 round of {@variantrule Regeneration|GW2}, healing equal to your proficiency bonus.
The source of that damage is inflicted with 1 round of {@variantrule Weakness|GW2}.
The source of that damage is inflicted with 1 stack of {@variantrule Confusion|GW2} for 1 round, taking damage equal to your proficiency bonus.
The source of that damage is inflicted with 1 round of {@variantrule Crippled|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Chilled
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Condition|GW2}, your speed is reduced by 66% and you have disadvantage on initiative rolls and your initiative count is decreased by your PB at the start of the round.
A creature with a {@variantrule Defiance Bar|GW2} takes 33 defiance bar damage at the start of its turn instead of being affected.
This {@variantrule Condition|GW2} get converted into 1 round of {@variantrule Alacrity|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Crippled
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Condition|GW2}, your speed is reduced by 50%.
A creature with a {@variantrule Defiance Bar|GW2} takes 15 defiance bar damage at the start of its turn instead of being affected.
This {@variantrule Condition|GW2} get converted into 2 rounds of {@variantrule Swiftness|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Combos
entries: Some skills create combo fields or finishers. A combo field is an area created by a skill that lasts for a certain duration. A combo finisher is a skill that can be used within a combo field to create a powerful effect. If multiple combo fields overlap, only the most recently created field is active. See the table below for the different types of combo fields and finishers (you refers to the creature who used a combo finisher).

entries.caption: Combo Fields and Finishers
rows: Each friendly creature within 35 feet of the blast's point of origin gains 1 round of {@variantrule Dark Aura|GW2}.
You gain 1 round of {@variantrule Dark Aura|GW2}.
You {@variantrule Life Steal|GW2|steal life} equal to your proficiency bonus from each target hit by the projectile finisher.
You fire up to three life-stealing projectiles at different random hostile targets within 90 feet, each {@variantrule Life Steal|GW2|stealing life} equal to half your proficiency bonus.
Each friendly creature within 35 feet of the blast's point of origin gains 1 round of {@variantrule Chaos Aura|GW2}.
You gain 1 round of {@variantrule Chaos Aura|GW2}.
You inflict 1 round of {@variantrule Confusion|GW2}, dealing your proficiency bonus damage, on any targets hit by the projectile finisher.
You fire up to three chaotic projectiles at different random hostile targets within 90 feet, each inflicting 1 round of {@variantrule Confusion|GW2}, dealing half your proficiency bonus damage.
Each friendly creature within 35 feet of the blast's point of origin gains 3 stacks of {@variantrule Might|GW2} for 6 rounds.
You gain 1 round of {@variantrule Fire Aura|GW2}.
You inflict 1 round of {@variantrule Burning|GW2}, dealing double your proficiency bonus damage, on any targets hit by the projectile finisher.
You fire up to three burning projectiles at different random hostile targets within 90 feet, each inflicting 1 round of {@variantrule Burning|GW2}, dealing your proficiency bonus damage.
Each friendly creature within 35 feet of the blast's point of origin gains 1 round of {@variantrule Frost Aura|GW2}.
You gain 1 round of {@variantrule Frost Aura|GW2}.
You inflict 1 round of {@variantrule Chilled|GW2}, on any targets hit by the projectile finisher.
You fire up to three chilling projectiles at different random hostile targets within 90 feet, each inflicting 1 round of {@variantrule Chilled|GW2}.
Each friendly creature within 35 feet of the blast's point of origin looses the latest {@variantrule condition|GW2}.
You gain 1 round of {@variantrule Light Aura|GW2}.
You remove the latest {@variantrule condition|GW2} from the closest friendly target to any target hit by the projectile finisher.
You fire up to three cleansing projectiles at different random friendly targets within 90 feet, each removing the latest {@variantrule condition|GW2}.
Each friendly creature within 35 feet of the blast's point of origin gains 2 rounds of {@variantrule Swiftness|GW2}.
Any targets hit by the leap finisher are {@variantrule Dazed|GW2} for 1 round.
You inflict 2 stacks of {@variantrule Vulnerability|GW2} for 1 round on any targets hit by the projectile finisher.
You fire up to three brutal projectiles at different random hostile targets within 90 feet, each inflicting 2 stacks of {@variantrule Vulnerability|GW2} for 1 round.
Each hostile creature within 35 feet of the blast's point of origin gains 1 round of {@variantrule Weakness|GW2}.
Any targets hit by the leap finisher gain 1 round of {@variantrule Weakness|GW2}.
You inflict 1 round of {@variantrule Poisoned|GW2}, dealing half your proficiency bonus damage, on any targets hit by the projectile finisher.
You fire up to three poisonous projectiles at different random hostile targets within 90 feet, each inflicting 1 round of {@variantrule Poisoned|GW2}, dealing half your proficiency bonus damage.
Each friendly creature within 35 feet of the blast's point of origin gains 1 round of {@variantrule Stealth|GW2}.
You inflict 1 round of {@variantrule Blindness|GW2} on any targets hit by the projectile finisher.
You fire up to three blinding projectiles at different random hostile targets within 90 feet, each inflicting 1 round of {@variantrule Blindness|GW2}.
Each friendly creature within 35 feet of the blast's point of origin regains hit points equal to twice your proficiency bonus.
You regain hit points equal to twice your proficiency bonus.
You grant 1 round of {@variantrule Regeneration|GW2}, healing twice your proficiency bonus, to the closest friendly target from any targets hit by the projectile finisher.
You fire up to three healing projectiles at different random friendly targets within 90 feet, each granting 1 round of {@variantrule Regeneration|GW2}, healing your proficiency bonus.

variantrule.name: Combo Field
entries: A combo field is an area created by a skill that lasts for a certain duration. If a {@variantrule Combo Finisher|GW2} is used within the area of a combo field, it triggers a powerful {@variantrule Combos|GW2| combo effect} based on the type of combo field and finisher.

variantrule.name: Combo Finisher
entries: A combo finisher is a special property of {@variantrule skill|GW2|skills} that allows them to trigger a powerful effect when used in {@variantrule combos|GW2|combination} with a {@variantrule Combo Field|GW2|field}.

variantrule.name: Condition
entries: Conditions are detrimental {@variantrule Effect|GW2|effects} with a set duration applied by various features.
They are the opposite of {@variantrule Boon|GW2|Boons}
Each Condition has an associated {@variantrule Boon|GW2}, which it can be converted into or corrupted from.
If a creature already under the effect of a Condition receives the same Condition again, one of two outcomes occurs, depending on the Conditions properties:
{@bold Stacks Duration:} The Conditions duration is extended by the duration of the new instance.

{@bold Stacks Intensity:} The Conditions effects are applied again. Each instance functions independently, with its own duration. If one instance of the Condition becomes converted, all active instances become converted. Any {@variantrule Boon|GW2} imposed by the conversion is applied only once.

variantrule.name: Confusion
entries: A confused creature takes psychic damage at the start of each of its turns and each time it takes an action, bonus action or legendary action.
The amount of psychic damage is determined by the effect that applied it.
This {@variantrule Condition|GW2} get converted into 1 round of {@variantrule Resolution|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Control Effect
entries: Control Effects are a special type of {@variantrule Effect|GW2|effects} that override any previous Control Effect when applied.

variantrule.name: Critical Failure
entries: A critical failure occurs when you roll a natural 1 on a saving throw.
When you critically fail a saving throw, you automatically fail the saving throw and, if the effect deals damage, you take maximum damage from the effect.

variantrule.name: Dark Aura
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Aura|GW2}, you reduce all damage you take from {@variantrule Condition|GW2|conditions} by an amount equal to half your proficiency bonus (to a minimum of 1 damage). Additionally, when you take damage, the source of that damage is inflicted with 2 stacks of {@variantrule Torment|GW2} for 1 round, taking damage equal to your proficiency bonus.

variantrule.name: Daze
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Control Effect|GW2}, you can only take the {@action Dodge|XPHB}, {@action Dash|XPHB} or {@action Disengage|XPHB} action on your turn.
A creature with a {@variantrule Defiance Bar|GW2} takes 100 defiance bar damage per round of {@variantrule Daze|GW2} instead of being affected.

variantrule.name: Disable
entries: To disable a creature is to inflict it with one of the following {@variantrule Control Effect|GW2|Control Effects}: {@variantrule Daze|GW2}, {@variantrule Stun|GW2}, {@variantrule Knockdown|GW2}, {@variantrule Pull|GW2}, {@variantrule Knockback|GW2}, {@variantrule Launch|GW2}, {@variantrule Float|GW2}, {@variantrule Sink|GW2}, {@variantrule Fear|GW2} or {@variantrule Taunt|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Distortion
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Effect|GW2}, you are immune to all damage and automatically succeed on all saving throws.

variantrule.name: Effect
entries: Effects are beneficial or detrimental effects with a set duration applied by various features.
If a creature already under the effect of an Effect receives the same Effect again, one of three outcomes occurs, depending on the Effects properties:
{@bold Stacks Duration:} The Effects duration is extended by the duration of the new instance.
{@bold Stacks Intensity:} The Effects effects are applied again. Each instance functions independently, with its own duration.
{@bold Control Effect:} Only the most recent {@variantrule Control Effect|GW2} applies.

variantrule.name: Elite Skill
entries: An elite skill is a special type of {@variantrule Skill|GW2} that provides powerful effects.

variantrule.name: Fear
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Condition|GW2}, you cant willingly move closer to the source of the {@variantrule Condition|GW2} and must use the Dash action to move away from it on your turn, if possible.
A creature with a {@variantrule Defiance Bar|GW2} takes 100 defiance bar damage at the start of its turn instead of being affected.
This {@variantrule Condition|GW2} get converted into 1 round of {@variantrule Stability|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Fire Aura
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Aura|GW2}, when you take damage you gain 2 rounds of {@variantrule Might|GW2} and the source of that damage is inflicted with 1 round of {@variantrule Burning|GW2}, taking damage equal to twice your proficiency bonus.

variantrule.name: Float
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Control Effect|GW2}, you are lifted 10 feet upwards at the start of your turn and cant take actions, bonus actions, reactions or move.
A creature with a {@variantrule Defiance Bar|GW2} takes defiance bar damage per round of {@variantrule Float|GW2} instead of being affected.

variantrule.name: Frost Aura
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Aura|GW2}, you reduce all damage you take from non-{@variantrule Condition|GW2} sources by an amount equal to half your proficiency bonus (to a minimum of 1 damage) and the source of that damage is inflicted with 1 round of {@variantrule Chilled|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Fury
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Boon|GW2}, the number you need to roll to score a critical hit is reduced by 5 and the {@variantrule Critical Failure|GW2} threshold is increased by 5 for your Save DCs.
This {@variantrule Boon|GW2} corrupts into 1 round of {@variantrule Blindness|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Healing Skill
entries: A healing skill is a special type of {@variantrule Skill|GW2} that restores hit points to a target.

variantrule.name: Immobilized
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Condition|GW2}, your speed is 0, you cannot take the Dodge action and you automatically fail dexterity saving throws.
A creature with a {@variantrule Defiance Bar|GW2} takes 50 defiance bar damage at the start of its turn instead of being affected.
This {@variantrule Condition|GW2} get converted into 1 round of {@variantrule Resistance|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Knockback
entries: When this {@variantrule Control Effect|GW2} is applied, you are moved away from the source of the effect by a distance determined by the effect that applied it.
A creature with a {@variantrule Defiance Bar|GW2} takes defiance bar damage instead of being affected.

variantrule.name: Knockdown
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Control Effect|GW2}, you are {@condition prone|XPHB} and cant take actions, bonus actions, reactions or move.
A creature with a {@variantrule Defiance Bar|GW2} takes 100 defiance bar damage per round of {@variantrule Knockdown|GW2} instead of being affected.

variantrule.name: Launch
entries: When this {@variantrule Control Effect|GW2} is applied, you are moved away in an arcfrom the source of the effect by a distance determined by the effect that applied it.
A creature with a {@variantrule Defiance Bar|GW2} takes defiance bar damage instead of being affected.

variantrule.name: Life Steal
entries: When you deal {@variantrule Life Steal|GW2} damage to a target, you regain hit points equal to the amount of {@variantrule Life Steal|GW2} damage dealt.

variantrule.name: Light Aura
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Aura|GW2}, you reduce all damage you take from {@variantrule Condition|GW2|conditions} by an amount equal to half your proficiency bonus (to a minimum of 1 damage) and when you take damage you gain 1 round of {@variantrule Resolution|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Magnetic Aura
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Aura|GW2}, when a ranged attack would hit you, it instead gets reflected back to the attacker. If the attack would hit the attacker, it deals damage as normal; otherwise, it misses.

variantrule.name: Might
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Boon|GW2}, you add 1 to all damage rolls.
If you critically hit you instead add 2 to that damage roll.
This {@variantrule Boon|GW2} corrupts into 1 round of {@variantrule Weakness|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Poison
entries: A poisoned creature takes poison damage at the start of each of its turns.
The amount of poison damage is determined by the effect that applied it.
While you are under this {@variantrule Condition|GW2}, you regain only two-thirds of the hit points you would normally heal.
This {@variantrule Condition|GW2} get converted into 2 rounds of {@variantrule Regeneration|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Profession Skill
entries: A profession skill is a special type of {@variantrule Skill|GW2} that is specific to a certain profession or class.

variantrule.name: Property
entries: Properties are special attributes that modify how a skill functions.

variantrule.name: Protection
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Boon|GW2}, you reduce all damage you take from non-{@variantrule Condition|GW2} sources by an amount equal to your proficiency bonus (to a minimum of 1 damage).
This {@variantrule Boon|GW2} corrupts into 3 stacks of {@variantrule Vulnerability|GW2} for 2 rounds.

variantrule.name: Pull
entries: When this {@variantrule Control Effect|GW2} is applied, you are moved closer to the source of the effect by a distance determined by the effect that applied it.
A creature with a {@variantrule Defiance Bar|GW2} takes 150 defiance bar damage instead of being affected.

variantrule.name: Quickness
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Boon|GW2}, you gain one additional action on your turn. That action can be used only to take the Attack (one weapon attack only), Dash, Disengage, Hide, or Utilize action.
This {@variantrule Boon|GW2} corrupts into 1 round of {@variantrule Slow|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Regeneration
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Boon|GW2}, at the start of your turn, if you have at least 1 hit point, you regain hit points.
The amount of healing is determined by the effect that applied it.
This {@variantrule Boon|GW2} corrupts into 1 stack of {@variantrule Poison|GW2} for 2 rounds, dealing damage equal to the half the PB of the creature who corrupted the Boon.

variantrule.name: Resistance
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Boon|GW2}, you are immune to {@variantrule Blinded|GW2}, {@variantrule Chilled|GW2}, {@variantrule Crippled|GW2}, {@variantrule Fear|GW2}, {@variantrule Immobilized|GW2}, {@variantrule Slow|GW2}, {@variantrule Taunt|GW2}, {@variantrule Weakness|GW2}, and {@variantrule Vulnerability|GW2}.
This {@variantrule Boon|GW2} corrupts into 1 round of {@variantrule Chilled|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Resolution
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Boon|GW2}, you reduce all damage you take from {@variantrule Condition|GW2|conditions} by an amount equal to your proficiency bonus (to a minimum of 1 damage).
This {@variantrule Boon|GW2} corrupts into 3 stacks of {@variantrule Confusion|GW2} for 1 round, dealing damage equal to the half the PB of the creature who corrupted the Boon.

variantrule.name: Revealed
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Effect|GW2}, you cannot gain the {@variantrule Stealth|GW2} {@variantrule Effect|GW2} or the {@condition Invisible|XPHB} condition.

variantrule.name: Shocking Aura
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Aura|GW2}, when you take damage the source of that damage is {@variantrule Stun|GW2|Stunned} for 1 round if they are within 25 feet of you.

variantrule.name: Sink
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Control Effect|GW2}, you are pushed 10 feet downwards at the start of your turn and cant take actions, bonus actions, reactions or move.
A creature with a {@variantrule Defiance Bar|GW2} takes defiance bar damage per round of {@variantrule Sink|GW2} instead of being affected.

variantrule.name: Skill
entries: Skills are special abilities that a creature can use to perform various actions in combat or other situations.
The following types of skills exist:
{@b {@variantrule Weapon Skill|GW2}:} A skill that requires a specific weapon to use.
{@b {@variantrule Healing Skill|GW2}:} A skill that restores hit points to a target.
{@b {@variantrule Utility Skill|GW2}:} A skill that provides various effects or benefits.
{@b {@variantrule Elite Skill|GW2}:} A powerful skill that often has a long cooldown and significant effects.
{@b {@variantrule Profession Skill|GW2}:} A skill that is specific to a certain profession or class.
{@b {@variantrule Special Skill|GW2}:} A skill that does not fit into the other categories and has unique properties.
Most skills have the following components:
{@b Name:} The name of the skill.
{@b Requirements:} Any prerequisites or conditions that must be met to use the skill.
{@b Type:} The category of the skill (e.g., weapon skill, healing skill, etc.).
{@b Casting Time:} The amount of time it takes to use the skill.
{@b Recharge:} The number you need to roll on a d20 to use the skill again. Roll 1d20 for each skill that is on recharge at the start of your turn.
{@b Range:} The distance at which the skill can be used.
{@b Target:} The creature(s) or area affected by the skill.
{@b Duration:} The length of time the skill's effects last.
{@b Properties:} Any special attributes or characteristics of the skill.
{@b Description:} A description of how the skill is used and how it looks.
{@b Effect:} A description of what the skill does.
{@b Scaling:} How the skill's effects improve as the user gains levels or other enhancements.

variantrule.name: Slow
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule condition|GW2}, on your turn, you can take either an action or a bonus action, but not both. If you take the Attack action, you can make only one attack regardless of the number of attacks you can normally make.
A creature with a {@variantrule Defiance Bar|GW2} takes 50 defiance bar damage at the start of its turn instead of being affected.
This {@variantrule Condition|GW2} converts into 1 round of {@variantrule Quickness|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Special Skill
entries: A special skill is a unique type of {@variantrule Skill|GW2} that does not fit into the other categories and has its own distinct properties.

variantrule.name: Stability
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Boon|GW2}, you are immune to {@variantrule Fear|GW2}, {@variantrule Taunt|GW2}, {@condition Prone|XPHB}, and getting moved against your will.

Each time you would be {@variantrule Fear|GW2|Feared}, {@variantrule Taunt|GW2|Taunted}, knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB}, or moved against your will you instead remove 1 stack of this {@variantrule Boon|GW2}.
This {@variantrule Boon|GW2} corrupts into 1 round of {@variantrule Fear|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Stealth
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Effect|GW2}, you gain the effects of the {@condition Invisible|XPHB} condition.
The effect ends if you deal damage or force a creature to make a saving throw.

variantrule.name: Stun
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Control Effect|GW2}, you cannot take {@variantrule action|XPHB|actions}, {@variantrule bonus action|XPHB|bonus actions}, {@variantrule reaction|XPHB|reactions} or move. Additionally, you automatically fail strength and dexterity saving throws.
A creature with a {@variantrule Defiance Bar|GW2} takes 100 defiance bar damage per round of {@variantrule Stun|GW2} instead of being affected.

variantrule.name: Stun Break
entries: {@variantrule Skill|GW2|Skills} with this {@variantrule Property|GW2} can be used to end any {@variantrule Control Effect|GW2} affecting you, even if the {@variantrule Control Effect|GW2} would normally prevent you from taking actions.

variantrule.name: Superspeed
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Effect|GW2}, your speed is increased by 100%.

variantrule.name: Swiftness
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Boon|GW2}, your speed is increased by 33%.
This {@variantrule Boon|GW2} corrupts into 2 rounds of {@variantrule Crippled|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Taunt
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Condition|GW2}, you must move closer to the source of the {@variantrule Condition|GW2} and must use the Dash action to move toward it on your turn, if possible.
If you are already within 5 feet of the source, you must use your action to make an unarmed strike against the source.
A creature with a {@variantrule Defiance Bar|GW2} takes 100 defiance bar damage at the start of its turn instead of being affected.
This {@variantrule Condition|GW2} get converted into 1 round of {@variantrule Stability|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Torment
entries: A tormented creature takes necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns.
The amount of necrotic damage is determined by the effect that applied it.
The damage gets doubled if the creature did not move on its last turn.
This {@variantrule Condition|GW2} get converted into 3 stacks of {@variantrule Might|GW2} for 2 rounds.

variantrule.name: Utility Skill
entries: A utility skill is a special type of {@variantrule Skill|GW2} that provides various effects or benefits.

variantrule.name: Vigor
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Boon|GW2}, can take the {@action Dodge|XPHB} action as a bonus action.
This {@variantrule Boon|GW2} corrupts into 2 stacks of {@variantrule Bleeding|GW2} for 2 rounds, dealing damage equal to the PB of the creature who corrupted the Boon.

variantrule.name: Vulnerability
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule condition|GW2}, you take 1% more damage whenever you take damage.
This {@variantrule Condition|GW2} converts into 1 round of {@variantrule Protection|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Weakness
entries: While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule condition|GW2}, you have a 50% chance of dealing half damage when you roll damage.

While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule condition|GW2}, you gain a malus to your AC and Dexterity saving throws equal to the PB of the creature who inflicted this {@variantrule condition|GW2}.
A creature with a {@variantrule Defiance Bar|GW2} takes 20 defiance bar damage at the start of its turn instead of being affected.
This {@variantrule Condition|GW2} converts into 3 stack of {@variantrule Might|GW2} for 2 rounds.

variantrule.name: Weapon Skill
entries: A weapon skill is a special type of {@variantrule Skill|GW2} that requires a specific weapon to use.
